Translations.Text: midneun salamdeul-eun beonseonghanani
ideul-eun yebaee imhayeo gyeomsonhaneun jadeul-imyeo
heosdoen mal-eul haji anhneun jadeul-i myeo
iseullamseleul bachineun jadeul-imyeo
geudeul-ui sungyeol-eul jikineun jadeul-ila
geuleona anaewa oleun son-i so yuhaneun geosdeul-eun je-oedoeeo namulal dega eobsnola
geuleona geu hangyeleul neom-eo yogmang eul gajin ja sillo geudeul-eun joeindeul ila
geudeul-ui sin-yong-eul jikigo gyeyag-eul junsuhaneun jadeul-imyeo
geudeul-ui yebaeleul chungsilhi jikineunjadeul-ini
ideul-i sangsog-indeul-i doeeo
cheongug-eul sangsogbad-a geu an-eseo yeongsaenghalila
sillo hananim-eun ingan-eul heulg-eu lo bich-eun da-eum
geuleul hanbang-ul-ui jeong-aeg-eulosseo anjeongdoen gos-e dueoss-eumyeo

geuleon da-eum geu jeong-aeg-eul eunghyeol sikigo geu eunghyeollosseo sal-eul mandeulgo geu sallosseo ppyeoleul mandeul-eoss-eumyeo sallo sseo geu ppyeoleul gamssage han hu daleun geos eul mandeul-eossnani gajang heullyunghasin ha nanimkke chugbog-i iss-eusoseo
geuleon hu neohui moduga imjong ke hani
simpan-ui nal neohui moduga buhwalhanola
hananim-eun neohui meoliwie chil cheon-eul mandeul-eoss-euni geubun-eun changjoha neunde gyeolko mugwansimhaji anhnola
hananim-eun haneullobuteo jeogdanghan-yang-ui bileul naelige hayeo ttang sog-e jeojanghadaga geugeos-eul dasi geodueo ganola
geugeos-eulo hananim-eun neohuileul wihae jonglyeonamuwa podoga yeollineun jeong-won-eul dueossnola geu an-e gwaildeul i pungbuhani neohuiga geu jung-eseo meog eula
sinai san-eseo namuleul ja lage hayeo igeos-eulo ollibeu gileum gwa sig-yong yangnyeom-eul saengsanke hayeossnola

gichug-edo neohuileul wihan gyohun eul dueossnani geuui mom-an-e issneun geos eulo hananim-i neohuiege masilgeos-eul junola neohuiga geu an-eseo yuighan geos-eul manh-i eodgo tto geugeos-eul gogilo seobchwihanola
neohuineun gachuggwa baeleul tanola
hananim-i noaleul geuui baegseong ege bonaeni geuga malhagil baegseongdeul iyeo hananim-eul gyeongbaehala geubun oe eneun sin-i eobsnani neohuineun dulyeobji anhneunyo

ittae geuui baegseong-gaunde bulsin jadeul-ui udumeoliga malhagil i sa lam-eun neohuiwa ttoggat-eun ingan-euloseo neohui wie gunlimhalyeo haneun jala man il hananimkkeseo tteus-i iss-eossdamyeon cheon sadeul-eul naelyeobonaess-eul geos-ila uli neun uli seonjodeul gaundeseodo ileon geos-eul deul-eoboji moshaessnola
sillo ineun michinja-e bulgwaha ni jamsidong-an gidalyeo bola hadeola
ie geuga malhagil juyeo geu deul-i jeoleul bujeonghaneun geos-e daehayeo jeolo hayeogeum seunglike hayeo jusoseo

geulihayeo hananim-eun geulo ha yeo uliga boneun ap-eseo uliui gyesie ttala bangjuleul mandeulla hayeoss-eu myeo uliui myeonglyeong-eulo gyegog-i mullo neomchini gag jonglyuui han ssang-gwa neoui gajog-eul taeulaneun malsseum-i iss-eossnolageuleona geojeolhan jadeul-eun je-oela joe jieun jadeul-eul wihae naege guwonhaji malla geudeul-eun igsahal geos-ila
neowa geuligo neowa hamkke han jaga baeleul tamyeonseo joejieun baegseongdeullobuteo jeohuileul guwonhayeo jusin hananimkkemodeun yeong-gwang-eul deulilago malhala
juyeo chugbogbad-eun ttang-e ileuge hayeo jusoseo dangsin-iyamallo geuleoh ge hal su issneun gajang hullyunghan bun-i siobnida
sillo geu an-eneun yejeung-i iss-eoss eumyeo ulineun i malsseum-eulo geudeul-eulsiheomhaessnola
geu huedo hananim-eun geudeul i hu tto daleun sedaeleul sewossnola
geudeul gaondee han yeeonjaleul bonaeeoss-euni ineun neohuiga hanbun bakk e eobsneun hananim-eul gyeongbaetolog ham-i la neohuineun dulyeobji anhneunyo

hyeonseeseo hananim-ui eunhyeleul bad-eun geu baegseong-ui jogjangdeul-eun mid-eum-eul bulsinhago naese-ui sangbong-eul bujeonghamyeo malhagil i salam-eun neohuiwa machanga jilo han ingan-e bulgwahani neohuiga meogneun geoscheoleom geudo meoggo neohuiga ma sineun geoscheoleom geudo masineun ingan-il ppun-ila
man-il neohuiwa daleulba eobsneun han ingan-ege bogjonghandamyeon neohuineun bunmyeong ilh-eunjadeul-i doelila hadeola
neohuiga jug-eo heulg-idoego ppyeoman nam-eul ttae neohuiga dasi sosaenghal geos-ila geuga yagsoghayeossdeonyo
neohuiga yagsogbad-eun geos-eun bulga neunghan geos-ila
sillo hyeonse-ui salm oeeneun amuleon saengmyeong-i eobsnola uliga jug-eo dasi sal-a buhwalhandaneun geos-eun bulganeung han il-ila
sillo geuneun hananim-e daehayeo geojishaneun han sanaee bulgwahageoneul ulineun geuleul mid-eul su eobsdoda
ittae yeeonjakkeseo juyeo jeoleul dowajusoseo geudeul-eun jeoleul bujeonghanaida lago giwonhanani
hananimkkeseo daedabhasa geudeul-eungod nwiuchige doelila
geuhu geudeul-ege jeogjeolhan beol-i naelyeojyeoss-euni hananim-eun geudeul-eul jug-eunnag-yeob-eulo mandeul-eo geu joejieun jadeul eul myeolmangke haessnola
geuleon da-eum hananim-eun geudeul ihuui daleun sedaeleul sewossnola
eoneu baegseongdeuldo geudeul-ui unmyeong eul jaechoghal su eobsgo ttohan yuyehal su eobsnola

hananim-eun chalyelo seonjijadeul-eulbonaessnola seonjijaga go-eul-e ileul ttaemaga geudeul-eun geuleul bujeonghayeossdeola geulihayeo ulineun geudeul-eul chalyedaelo myeolmangsikyeo geudeul-eul dansunhan iyagigeo lilo mandeul-eossnola midji anhneun jadeul eun icheoleom myeolmanghanila
geuhu hananim-eun mosewa geuui hyeongje alon-eul malsseumgwa yejeung-eulo bo naessnola
palaowa geuui udumeoliege do bonaess-euna geudeul-eun omanhan baegseong eulo geoman-eul piwossnola
geudeul-i malhagil uliwa daleul ba eobsneun du ingan-eul mid-eoya haneu nyo geu du ingan-ui baegseongdeul-eun uli ui jongbogdeul-i anideonyo
ileohdeus du yeeonjaleul bulsinha yeoss-euni geudeul-eun myeolmanghanja gaunde iss-eossnola
hananim-eun moseege seongseoleul jueo ilo geudeul-i indobaddolog ha yeossnola
hananim-eun maliaui adeulgwa geuui eomeonileul hanaui yejeung-eulo hago nop-eun gos-eul geudeul-ege ansigcheo lo jegonghani geugos-eneun mogchowa saem i issdeola
seonjijadeul-iyeo heolagdoen joh-eun geosdeul-eul seobchwihadoe seon-eul haenghala neo huiga haenghaneun ildeul-eul naega algo issnola
sillo neohuiui gongdongcheneun hana imyeo naega neohuiui junim-igeoneul hang sang naleul dulyeowohala
geuleona baegseongdeul-eun hanaui jong gyoeseo yeoleo jongpalo bun-yeolhan hu gagjongpa-e manjoghago issnola
geuleona jamsidong-an geudeul-eul heun lanhan mujisangtaelo dula
hananim-i geudeul-ege jaesangwa jason-eul julila geudeul-eun saeng-gaghaneu nyo
hananim-i geudeul-eul wihae seodul leo seon-eul haenghago issdago saeng-gaghana geuleohji anhnola geudeul-i moleul ppun-i la
sillo junim-eul dulyeowo hamyeo saenghwalhago
junim-ui jingpyoleul hwagjeunghamyeo
junim oee daleun geos-eul seomgijianhgo
junimkkelo dol-agal geos-eul dulyeo wohamyeo ma-eum-eulo jaseon-eul bepunja issnani
ideul-eun seodulleo seon-eul haenghamyeo apjangseo silcheonhanola
hananim-eun neunglyeog isang-eulo mu geoun jim-eul juji anihamyeo jinlileul boyeojuneun gilog-eul gajigo iss-euni geudeul-eun gyeolko bulgongpyeonghan daejeob-eul bad ji anhnola
geuleona geudeul-ui ma-eum-eun igeos eul jeonhyeo yeomdue duji anh-eumyeo hon dongwa geu bakk-ui daleun haeng-wileul gyesog hani
an-ihage sal-aganeun geudeul-ege beol-eul naelyeossnola ittae geudeul-eun aewon hadeola
oneul-e ileuleo aewonhaji mal la malsseum-i iss-euljini neohuineun bunmyeong hananim-ui guwon-eul badji moshalila
naui malsseum-i neohuiege nangsong doel ttaemada neohuineun dol-aboji ani haessdeola
geugeos-e gwanhan mujihan maldeul-eun bam-e uhwaleul yaegihaneun geosgwa gat-eun geos-eulo
geudeul-eun wae hananim-ui malsseum-eul suggohaji ani haneunyo geudeul seonjo deul-ege eobs-eossdeon geos-i geudeul-ege wass dago saeng-gaghaneunyo
animyeon geudeul-i geudeul-ui seonji jaleul alji moshayeo geuleul bujeonghalyeo haneunyo
animyeon geuga michin salam-ila go maldeul haneunyo geuleona geubun-eun geu deul-ege jinlileul gajigo wass-euna geudeuldaebubun-i geu jinlileul silh-eohadeola

amado geu jinliga geudeul-ui yogmang-eul ttalassdamyeon haneulgwa ttang-gwa geu ligo geu an-e issneun modeun geos-i mu jilseosog-e iss-eoss-eulila hananim-i geudeul-ege gyohun-eul bonaessneundedo geudeul eun geu gyohun-e deung-eul dollideola
neohuineun geudeul-ege eotteon bosang eul yoguhaneunyo junim-ui bosang-i ga jang joh-eun geos-eulo geubun-eun gajang hullyunghan suyeojaisila
sillo geudaega geudeul-eul olh-eun gillo indohago iss-euna
naeseleul midji anihan jadeul-eun geu gillobuteo talseonhago iss-euni
man-il hananim-i geudeul-ege ja bileul bepul-eo geudeul-ui gotong-eul jegeo hayeo jundahadeolado geudeul-eun joeag-eul deohayeo banghwanghage doelila
hananim-i geudeul-eul beolhayeossneun dedo geudeul-eun junimkkae gyeomsonchi ani hago gancheonghaji anhdeola
hananim-i geudeul-ege gahoghan beol-ui mun-eul yeol ttaee bola geudeul-eun geu an-eseo jeolmanghage doelila
geubunkkeseo neohuiege cheong-gaggwa sigaggwa choggag-eul jusyeossgeonman neohuineun gamsahaneunde insaeghadoda
neohuileul jisang-e beonsigke hasin bun-i geubun-isini neohuineun geubunkkelo jibhabdoelila
saengmyeong-eul jusigo as-agasineun bundo geubun-isimyeo najgwa bam-eul dalli hayeo jusineun bundo geubun-isigeoneul neohuineun alji moshaneunyo
geuleona geudeul-eun seonjodeul-i mal han geosgwa daleul ba eobs-euni
uliga jug-eo heulg-gwa ppyeoga doeeoss eul ttae dasi buhwaldoel su issneunyo la go geudeul-i malhadoda
ileohan il-eun uliege geuli go uli seonjodeul-egedo yagsogdoeeossji man sillo igeos-eun yes yaegie bulgwaha da malhani
illeogalodoe daejiwa geu an-e issneun modeun geos-i nuguege soghayeo issneunyo neohuiga man-il algo issdamyeon malhala
geudeul-eun malhalila hananimkke gwisoghayeo issdoda illeogalodoe geulaedo neohuineun gyohun-eul sulaghaji anhneunyo
illeogalodoe chilcheon-ui ju-in-eun nugu-imyeo gwonjaui ju-in-eun nugunyago hal ttae
hananimkkae gwisogdoeeo issdoda lago geudeul-i malhalini illeogalodoeneohuineun geulaedo dulyeowohaji anhneunyo
illeogalodoe modeun geos-eul jugwan hasineun bun-i nugusinyo tto modeun geos-eul bohohasina bohobadji anihan bun-eun nugusinyo man-il neohuideul-i a neun jadeul-ilamyeon malhala hani
hananim isila geudeul-i malha lini illeogalodoe geuleomyeon eojjihayeoneohuineun hyeonhogdoego issneunyo
hananim-i geudeul-ege jinlileul jueossgeonman sillo geudeul-eun geojis-eul mal haneun jadeul-ila

hananim-eun jasig-eul duji ani hasyeoss-eumyeo geubun-eul daejeoghal eotteohan sindo eobsnola man-il daleun manh-eun sindeul-i iss-eossdamyeon gag sindeul-eun jagiga changjohan geos-eul ppaeas-a gass-eul geos-imyeo daleun sin-eul jibaehaess-eulila hananim-iyeogeudeul-i myosahaneun geos-eul chowolhayeo hollo yeong-gwangbad-eusoseo
geubun-eun boiji anhneun geosgwa boineun geosdo da asineun bun-isini geubunkkeseoneun geudeul-i biyuhalyeoneun geos wie gyesinila
illeogalodoe juyeo jeolo hayeo geum geudeul-ege yagsogdoen geos-eul boisi lyeomyeon
juyeo jeoleul joejieun baegseong-gaun de duji maobsoseo
sillo hananim-eun geubun-i geudeul ege yagsoghan geos-eul geudaeege boyeo jul su issnola
seonhaeng-eulo ag-eul jjoch-eula hana nim-eun geudeul-i malhaneun geos-eul algo issnola
illeogalodoe juyeo salamdeul-ui yuhog-eulobuteo dangsinkke boholeul guha naida
geudeul-i je ap-e natanaji anhdolog dangsinkke boholeul guhanaida
jug-eum-i geudeul-ege ileul ttae ju yeo jeoleul dasi dollyeobonae jusoseo

jega namgyeodun yeosaeng dong-an seon eul haenghal su issnaida lago malhana geuleona gyeolko hal su eobsnani geugeos-eun geuga jikkeol-ineun mal-e bulgwahamyeo geu deul ap-eneun buhwalhaneun geunalkkaji jang byeog-i iss-eul ppun-ila
geunal napal-i bulliumyeon geudeulsaie deo isang-ui yudae gwangyega eobs eojimyeo seologa mudjido ani hanola
geuttae geuui seonhaeng-i manh-assdeon jadeul-eun beonseonghal geos-imyeo
geuui jeoul-i gabyeoun jadeul-eungeudeul-ui yeongheun-eul ilhgo jiog-eseo yeong wonhi sanola
bul-i geudeul-ui eolgul-eul taeunigeudeul-eun geu an-eseo gotong-eul masbodeo la
naui malsseum-i neohuiege nang songdoeji ani hayeossneunyo neohuineun geu geos-eul bujeonghayeossnola
ittae geudeul-i malhalini juyeobulhaeng-i jeohuileul deopchinaida jeohuineun banghwanghaneun baegseong-ieossseubnida
juyeo geugeos-eulobuteo jeohuileul guhayeo jusoseo jeohuiga dasi joeag eul banboghandamyeon sillo jeohuiga joein deul-iobnida lago hani
geubunkkeseo malsseum-i issnola geuan-eulo deul-eogala geuligo naege mal haji malla
juyeo midnani jeohuileul yongseohayeo jusigo jabileul bepul-eo juobso seo dangsin-iyamallo gajang hullyunghan ja bileul bepusin bun-isibnida lago mal haneun muliga naui jongdeul gaunde iss-eossdeola
geuleona neohuideul-eun geudeul-eul jolonghayeo geugeos-eulo neohuiga naleul yeom-wonhaneun geos-eul mang-gagke haess-eumyeo geuttae neohuiga geudeul-eul biusgo iss-eossnola
sillo naneun oneul geudeul-i in naehan geos-eulo bosang-eul hanani geudeul i seunglijadeul-ila
geubunkkeseo neohuineun myeochhae dong-anjisang-e chelyuhayeossneunyo lago malsseumha sini
halu animyeon haluui ilbubun-e jinaji anhseubnida sem-eul gyesanha neun ja-ege mul-eobosibsiyo lago geu deul-eun daedabhadeola
neohuiga algo issdamyeon sillo neohuineun jamsi chelyuhan geos-e bulgwaha daneun geubun-ui malsseum-i eoss-eossnola
hananim-i neohuileul jangnan-eulo changjohayeossda saeng-gaghayeossneunyo sillo neo huineun geubun-egelo dol-aganila
jinliui wang-isin hananim-eul chan-yanghala geubun oeeneun sin-i eobs-eumyeo geubun-eun ogjwaui ju-in-isila
hananimgwa deobul-eo amuleon gwonhando eobsneun daleun sin-eul sungbaehaneunja junimkkeseo geuleul gyesanhasini sillo bulsinjadeul-eun beonseongchi moshalila
illeogalodoe juyeo yongseohayeo jusigo jabileul bepul-eo jusoseo dang sin-iyamallo eunhyeleul bepuneun gajang hullyunghan bun-isiobnida
